phdcocktail 0.0.0.9000
  • Reference

Function reference

Recode

Transform collected raw data into a publication-ready format

recode_vrs()
Recode variables and their levels based on a data dictionary

Plot

Generate insightful visualizations from clinical data

plot_bars()
Plot % of outcomes as bars

Report

Report summary statistics in a publication-ready format

report_quantiles()
Report median-quantiles summaries
print(<quantiles_report>)
A custom print method for the 'quantiles_report' class

Transport

Transfer data between R session and the output folder

export_safely()
Export files to the 'output' folder
save_work()
Save global objects to the 'output' folder
load_recent_work()
Load most recent saved R workspace
delete_output()
Delete files from the 'output' folder
start_fresh()
Restart R session

Data

Datasets included in the package

ibd_data_dict
Data dictionary for Inflammatory Bowel Disease (IBD) data
ibd_data1 ibd_data2
Inflammatory Bowel Disease (IBD) datasets
ibd_outcomes
Inflammatory Bowel Disease (IBD) outcomes
